website_summaries.verdict: A six-piece set containing two bath towels, two hand towels, and two washcloths.
pros: Manufactured by a known company in the fashion industry
cons: These dark-colored towels should be washed in cold water to avoid bleeding

customer_reviews.title: A nice set
customer_reviews.text: They are functional, albeit not as absorbent as the thread count would suggest, but they work well enough, and with current trends in housewares, at least give men an option to have towels that are not in pastels.
customer_reviews.author: M. Ballantyne

customer_reviews.title: Great but discolored? when washed
customer_reviews.text: So I was super happy with the feel and look of these towels. They are super soft and absorbent wash after wash. The only problem I have is that when I washed them before a first use, 1 large towel and a hand towel, looked like I had bleached them to some extent. There was some discoloration from the gray to an orange color. :( I will continue to use them because I LOVE the feel but they are not pretty to see in their current state. And just to be clear, I DID NOT bleach them nor was there any chance of them getting bleached because I do not use bleach in my laundry.
customer_reviews.author: Vanessa Martinez

customer_reviews.title: Amazing towels worth every $ still spent
customer_reviews.text: These towels are great. Super soft, large, well made just compare them to a cheaper towel. The thickness, softness, and nice edges just make them look of higher quality. I now see why people say they make them wanna get back in the shower just to use them again. No regrets on the purchase, be sure to give them a good wash before first use they will shed a lot of lint. Might wanna do 2 wash and dries just to get it all imo.
customer_reviews.author: Jim

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I like these soft and absorbent towel set. The look is good, the plushness, nice, and the price, well a little steep. Still, I am liking the set.
customer_reviews.author: Christine W

customer_reviews.title: Soft, well made towels
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what you'd expect from Nautica, soft and sturdy towels. Make sure to prewash them twice however or you'll be picking lint off yourself for hours after your first use.
customer_reviews.author: Dana

customer_reviews.title: Good quality, happy with purchase.
customer_reviews.text: Good quality and generous size. I deducted a star for softness because the only thing I disliked about them was the GIANT tag they have on them. It gets in the way during use and I haven't felt like cutting it off of all of them yet. I'm not sure why they would attach a tag that large to a washcloth but for the price you can't beat these!
customer_reviews.author: Samantha Somero

customer_reviews.title: Excellent purchase
customer_reviews.text: These are excellent towels! Soft and absorbent. They do release a lot of lint in the dryer the first several washings. I've had them about six months now and I'll continue to purchase these towels when needed. They hold up well and do the job required.
customer_reviews.author: S. Howell

customer_reviews.title: Fabulous
customer_reviews.text: These towels blended in perfectly with the bathroom colours and the owl shower curain. They are plush and soft also.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara R. Helwig

customer_reviews.title: Not great
customer_reviews.text: Had Nautica towels that lasted 10 years. These are not them... had a seam unravel after the first wash.
customer_reviews.author: Julie

customer_reviews.title: These things make me wanna get back in the shower and dry off again!
customer_reviews.text: Plush, soft, and absorbing...all that you can ask for in a towel. Great purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Airtime278

customer_reviews.title: Very good mid-priced tool set would make a very nice gift
customer_reviews.text: These Nautica towels are very soft even after the first wash. The tag suggests washing them in cold water alone before use. After washing and drying on low with wool dryer balls they came out fresh and soft. The finish on the edging and stitching is excellent, as far as I can see. The proof comes in how well a towel dries you after bathing and how soft it is on your skin. This towels dries well, not great and is very soft on your body. The tag says they are made in India of 100% cotton. I feel for the quality and finish, they offer very good value.
customer_reviews.author: Nitty's Mom

customer_reviews.title: Nice. Soft. Washes well
customer_reviews.text: Very pleasantly surprised. Was very happy to try out and review. I just had gotten some white towels so this was good. Came packaged sealed in plastic bag and clean. First thing I did was wash / dry. Used tide pods and I did use colored bleach pods. (I noticed later it says no bleach on tag). Towels came out great. They are absorbent and feel soft and cozy after shower.
customer_reviews.author: R B

customer_reviews.title: Great set of towels for a reasonable price
customer_reviews.text: I'll start by saying that I'm ordering more. These are high quality towels, competitively priced at less than $50 for the six pieces included in the set. While not a bath sheet, the bath towels are ample in size, soft, and very absorbent. Additionally, the seams are well stitched and I expect them to last a long time. Recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Dean Burns

customer_reviews.title: 100% cotton and they are soft and thick and lauder well
customer_reviews.text: Simple yet elegant and 100% make a wonderful addition to my loads of laundry every week! This set comes with 2 washcloths, 2 hand towels and 2 bath towels. They are thick and soft and stand up to my 16-year-old teenage son leaving them on the floor of his room after showering, I bleach these and they come out looking great.
customer_reviews.author: Sandra Trolinger

customer_reviews.title: Beautifully soft and vibrant
customer_reviews.text: These towels are plush and feel like a luxurious treat after a bath. They launder well and retain their vibrant white. The pile stays fluffy and odors are not trapped inside after a few uses like with other, cheaply made towels. I will get these in another shade for our guest bath since they're so beautiful!
customer_reviews.author: frisky2000

customer_reviews.title: They certainly feel nice.
customer_reviews.text: I took these with the intention that they would be guest towels, but my daughter co-opted them for herself. At least she likes them. Says they're soft and absorbent. They certainly feel nice.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Edges frayed on the first washing
customer_reviews.text: Nice soft and absorbent towels, but on the first wash the edges frayed. Very disappointing! I'd buy used towels first. Not much else to say.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Alberigi McKenzie

customer_reviews.title: Falling apart -never used - washed ONCE!
customer_reviews.text: Washed before using and towel is already coming apart! Poor quality. Don’t waste your money these towels will be falling apart by the 3rd wash. Terrible buy!!!
customer_reviews.author: Girlinmtns

customer_reviews.title: Nice quality and absorbent
customer_reviews.text: Wow I really like me new towels they are soft and fluffy but also seem to be really absorbent. I like the 6piece set as it gives me a spare hand towel and I find the washcloths also to be a really nice quality They seem to wash up nicely I will be getting some more sets to add to our bathroom
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Gave as gift
customer_reviews.text: I gave these as a gift, but they are thick, looked nice and they were labeled Nautica.
customer_reviews.author: Nachomomma

customer_reviews.title: Look Goid, Feel Good, Dry Well
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased with these towels. As the family grows and leaves new towels are needed. I wanted some towels that had a good feel, thick enough, soft, and towels that would dry quickly. In this set there are two good sized washcloths, two hand towels and two bath towels, in white. I prefer white towels in my bathroom. I washed and dried the towels before use. The towels came out of the dryer, fluffy enough. No shrinkage that I could perceive. They look good, feel good, dry well, what could be better? Recommended. prisrob 05-01-18
customer_reviews.author: prisrob

customer_reviews.title: Nice, but not perfect.
customer_reviews.text: These are soft,absorbent and wash up nicely. I was disappointed,however, with the sloppy finishing. The shapes were not exact (for instance, the washcloth not a perfect square), and the finishing was equally rushed and sloppy. I expect better from Nautica.
customer_reviews.author: Oceania

customer_reviews.title: I LOVE these. Simple I know
customer_reviews.text: AHHH!! so soft SOOOO white!! Please help me keep them bright white forever lol. I LOVE these. Simple I know, not like some grand exotic material, but totally cool towels. I have them set out looking cool. I don't use them, their just for my guest. Simple bright white soft towels - cant be beaten!!
customer_reviews.author: CDA

customer_reviews.title: Gorgeous towel set
customer_reviews.text: This six piece set of bright white towels is definitely luxurious spa quality. The dimensions are also generous. All edges are secure, and they should wear for years.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Ann

product_meta.title: Nautica | Belle Haven Collection | 100% Cotton Terry Super Soft Plush Wash Set, Durable & Absorbent Bath Towels, Easy Care Machine Washable, 6-pc, Navy
product_meta.description: Add a touch of elegance and style to your bathroom with the Nautica Belle Haven towel set. Choose between several color options: white, grey, Navy, and pastel green. Towel set includes 2 bath towels, 2 hand towels and 2 wash cloths. Towel are super soft and absorbent. Towels feature our classic Nautica stripe dobby pattern. A perfect addition to update your bathroom. Oversized bath towel measures 30x54 inches.
feature_bullets: INCLUDES: (2) bath towels, (2) hand towels, (2) wash cloths
FEATURES: Zero twist construction allows for a fluffy and soft feel. Fibers stay durable after many washes. Lofty for maximum absorbency
DIMENSIONS: Bath Towels: 30" x 54", Hand Towels: 16" x 26", Wash Cloth: 13" x 13"
CARE INSTRUCTIONS: Machine washable for easy care. Machine wash cold, separately. Delicate cycle. Tumble dry low. Do not bleach

specifications.Customer Reviews: 3.7 out of 5 stars7 ratings3.7 out of 5 stars
